statements: DELETE FROM crypto_wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = 15 AND currency_type = 'BTC';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND tracking_enabled = TRUE;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Unusual Activity';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE wallet_id = 1 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE wallet_address = '0x12aBc34Ef5CD6789' AND balance <= 0.5;
DELETE FROM Wallet WHERE wallet_owner_id = 100 AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Transaction WHERE sender_address_id = 500 AND amount > 1000;
